CustomField.description: The Approval Status of the Timesheet Entry
CustomField.formula: If( tc9_et__Approval_Flag__c, "Approved", If( tc9_et__Rejection_Flag__c , "Rejected", If( tc9_et__Submitted_Flag__c, "Submitted", "New" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Approval Status of the Timesheet Entry
CustomField.label: Approval Status (No Colour)
